page.title: 09The A458
page.content: The main A458 Welshpool to Shrewsbury road dominates the northern part of our square. The main traffic on our roads are cars, lorries and vans.The traffic travels at high speed through the village.In the winter there is less traffic because not so many people want to travel on the roads because of the weather.We did a survey on the 26 June and the second class had done a survey in April and the number of cars was different it was more cars in April than in June.This surprised us but the weather has been very poor in 1985 when the council alter the roads they seem to do it in the summer which causes alot of accident's and it holds the traffic up.The most accident's are at Parry's shop.This term for example a lorry overturned and spilt tea-towels.There are 2 well used garages on the A458.
